  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92712</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92712</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La rotation de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">The earth's rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Umdrehung der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A rotação da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rotazione della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γήινη περιστροφή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La rotación de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la terre tournant sur son axe une fois toutes les 24 heures. La position de la  Grande-Bretagne par rapport au soleil est montrée par intervalle toutes les six heures.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the earth spinning on its axis once every 24 hours.  The position of Britain relative to the Sun every six-hour interval is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">24 heures</string>
            <string language="en">24 hours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">jour et nuit</string>
            <string language="en">day and night</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rotation de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Masse, die einmal auf 
seine Mittellinie alle 24 Stunden spinnt. Die Position von 
Großbritannien im Verhältnis zu der Sonne jeder sechsstündige 
Abstand wird gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a terra que gira em sua 
linha central uma vez cada 24 horas. A posição de Grâ 
Bretanha relativo ao sol cada intervalo six-hour é mostrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la terra che fila una
volta sul relativo asse ogni 24 ore. La posizione della 
Gran-Bretagna riguardante il sole ogni intervallo di sei ore è 
indicata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη γη που περιστρέφει στον
άξονά της μιά φορά κάθε 24 ώρες. Η θέση της Μεγάλης 
Βρετανίας σχετικά με τον ήλιο κάθε έξι ωρών διάστημα 
εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la tierra que hace girar
en su eje una vez cada 24 horas. La posición de Gran Bretaña 
concerniente al sol cada intervalo de seis horas se muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">24 Stunden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tag und Nacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">24 horas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dia e noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotação da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">24 ore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giorno e notte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">24 ώρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ημέρα και νύχτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">24 horas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">día y noche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rotación de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
